co.cask.coopr.store

Class DBQueryExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.coopr.store.DBQueryExecutor

  • public final class DBQueryExecutor
extends Object
    Executes prepared statements against databases while taking care of serialization/deserialization of blobs.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T deserializeBlob(Blob blob, Class<T> clazz)
      Deserialize a blob into an object.

      Queries for a single number, returning the value of the number or 0 if there are no results.

      Queries the store for a single item, deserializing the item and returning it or null if the item does not exist.

      Queries the store for a list of at most limit items, deserializing the items and performing a transform before before placing the transformed object into the output, finally returning an immutable list of transformed items.

      • getQuerySet

        public <T> com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<T> getQuerySet(PreparedStatement statement,
                                                        Class<T> clazz)
                                                      throws SQLException
        Queries the store for a set of items, deserializing the items and returning an immutable set of them. If no items exist, the set will be empty. Statement passed in must be closed by the caller.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the items being queried.
        Parameters:
        statement - PreparedStatement of the query, ready for execution.
        clazz - Class of the items being queried.
        Returns:
        Immutable set of items queried for.
        Throws:
        SQLException

                                                        throws SQLException
        Queries the store for a list of items, deserializing the items and returning an immutable list of them. If no items exist, the list will be empty. Statement passed in must be closed by the caller.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the items being queried.
        Parameters:
        statement - PreparedStatement of the query, ready for execution.
        clazz - Class of the items being queried.
        Returns:
        Immutable list of objects that were queried for.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • getQueryList

        public <T> com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<T> getQueryList(PreparedStatement statement,
                                                          Class<T> clazz,
                                                          int limit)
                                                        throws SQLException
        Queries the store for a list of at most limit items, deserializing the items and returning an immutable list of them. If no items exist, the list will be empty. Statement passed in must be closed by the caller.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the items being queried.
        Parameters:
        statement - PreparedStatement of the query, ready for execution.
        clazz - Class of the items being queried.
        limit - Max number of items to get.
        Returns:
        Immutable list of objects that were queried for.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • getQueryList

        public <F,T> com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<T> getQueryList(PreparedStatement statement,
                                                            Class<F> clazz,
                                                            com.google.common.base.Function<F,T> transform)
                                                        throws SQLException
        Queries the store for a list of at most limit items, deserializing the items and performing a transform before before placing the transformed object into the output, finally returning an immutable list of transformed items. If no items exist, the list will be empty. Statement passed in must be closed by the caller.
        Type Parameters:
        F - Type of item being queried
        T - Type of item to return
        Parameters:
        statement - PreparedStatement of the query, ready for execution.
        clazz - Class of the items being queried in the statement.
        transform - Transform to perform to change the deserialized object in the table to the object in the output.
        Returns:
        Immutable list of transformed objects that were queried for.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • getQueryList

        public <F,T> com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<T> getQueryList(PreparedStatement statement,
                                                            Class<F> clazz,
                                                            com.google.common.base.Function<F,T> transform,
                                                            int limit)
                                                        throws SQLException
        Queries the store for a list of at most limit items, deserializing the items and performing a transform before before placing the transformed object into the output, finally returning an immutable list of transformed items. If no items exist, the list will be empty. Statement passed in must be closed by the caller.
        Type Parameters:
        F - Type of item being queried
        T - Type of item to return
        Parameters:
        statement - PreparedStatement of the query, ready for execution.
        clazz - Class of the items being queried in the statement.
        transform - Transform to perform to change the deserialized object in the table to the object in the output.
        limit - Max number of items to get.
        Returns:
        Immutable list of transformed objects that were queried for.
        Throws:
        SQLException

        public int getNum(PreparedStatement statement)

      • hasResults

        public boolean hasResults(PreparedStatement statement)
                   throws SQLException
        Performs the query and returns whether or not there are results. Statement passed in must be closed by the caller.
        Parameters:
        statement - PreparedStatement of the query, ready for execution.
        Returns:
        True if the query has results, false if not.
        Throws:
        SQLException
